subsection.title: Managing email subscriptions
subsection.p: Users can manage their email subscriptions via their profile page. If you are a Mingle administrator, with access to users' profile pages, you will also be able to view and manage other users' subscriptions.

steps.title: To view and to unsubscribe to email subscriptions:
steps.item: go to your profile page or the profile page of another user
on this Subscription tab you will be able to see what subscriptions you have (or if you are a Mingle admin viewing another user's profile you will be able to see what subscriptions that user has)
using the unsubscribe link you can unsubscribe to any subscriptions you no longer require
